headline: Defense stocks gain on Lutnick comments, AMD & IBM, Cracker Barrel
summary: Investors are watching defense stocks, like Lockheed Martin (LMT), Northrop Grumman (NOC), and General Dynamics (GD), following comments from Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick. They are also eyeing AMD (AMD) and IBM (IBM), as well as Cracker Barrel (CBRL) during Tuesday's session. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Space Militarization Market to Reach $88.6 Billion by 2030, Driven by Advanced Defense Strategies

headline: Assured Positioning, Navigation, And Timing (PNT) Global Market Report 2025-2029 and 2034 | Rising Security Demand, Infrastructure Upgrades, and Modernization Programs Fueling Expansion
summary: The Assured Positioning, Navigation, and Timing (PNT) market is set to grow from $1.05 billion in 2024 to $3.74 billion by 2029, at a CAGR of 29%. Key drivers include the rising adoption of UAVs and autonomous vehicles, demand for secure navigation solutions, and integration of advanced technologies like AR/VR.
